com.autogarcon.android

Class ActiveSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autogarcon.android.ActiveSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ActiveSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that holds all user and order data for a user's session on the application. This object is used as a way to pass a large amount of useful information through activities on the application and update any necessary state based off of user interaction.
    Author:
    Mitchell Nelson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
